Text: I went to Staples today and bought a 3 TB external hard drive. Guy asked me if I worked for a tech company needing all that space. I told him no, I just ran out of storage for all my porn. Little did he know I was serious ;). Thanks guys!!!

ahaha philsfan5 that's hilarious:) i have 1,5TB and ran out of space yesterday, not good at all...

thanks merzedes!
Happy to help you fill your drives. Man, we should be getting a commision :)
:). No human needs this much porn, but screw it!
hahaha shallow, you got it! How much you want every 50 GB? Keep in mind, they charged me $179 for the friggin drive! (not bad considering)
